content: Finally, with every area explored, it's time to get out of here. Cross the large field past the Longevity Road Shrine and you'll find a passage through the cliffs to the nearby temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
Finally, with every area explored, it's time to get out of here. Cross the large field past the Longevity Road Shrine and you'll find a passage through the cliffs to the nearby temple.
